Text.Name: TreePoplar
Text.Desc: Fast growing tree with a soft and steady texture. Premium source of wood.

Text.Name: TreePine
Text.Desc: Slow growing tree, tall and straight with a solid texture.

Text.Name: TreePear
Text.Desc: Common fruit tree, the wood of which is fine but easy to rot. Its yields are generally small.

Text.Name: TreeGinkgo
Text.Desc: A kind of large and slow growing tree that can attain spirituality. Its fruit is edible and has an incredible healing ability.

Text.Name: TreeGinkgo_Big
Text.Desc: Very old ginkgo tree. Huge and permeated with Qi.

Text.Name: TreeGinkgo_Dead
Text.Desc: Dead Phoenixwood tree which is still incredibly tall.
